title: Vel'Koz Visual Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body:
Today, Dec. 7th '15, I played an ARAM as Arclight Vel'Koz. There was a bug that appeared in which the character model froze, occasionally with all of his tentacles extended into a triangle. Near the end of the game, I found I was able to replicate the visual effects by Auto-Attacking while the animations from his abilities were happening.

I have a recording of the game, but I don't quite know how I'd even start putting it as a link here. It was pretty spooky  {{champion:161}} 

It was pretty simple to replicate, especially after a few tries.

1. Use one of his basic abilities, I don't know if the Disintegration Ray would work.
2. Auto-Attack something nearby. In the ARAM I played, my only targets were Minions, Champions, and Illaio Tentacles.
3. The character model may freeze. I found that using Q created the triangle and E made him create a little upside-doen heart.

replies.body:
Hey SpindaSwirlz! 

Thanks for the awesome bug report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating!
